אַ֭חֲרִיתוֹ <S%H319><s%> a-cha-ri-to At the last כְּנָחָ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> ke-na-Chash like a serpent יִשָּׁ֑ךְ <S%H5391><s%> yish-Shach; it biteth וּֽכְצִפְעֹנִ֥י <S%H6848><s%> u-che-tzif-'o-Ni like an adder יַפְרִֽשׁ׃ <S%H6567><s%> yaf-Rish. and stingeth

עֵ֭ינֶיךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-nei-cha Thine eyes יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U shall behold זָר֑וֹת <S%H2114><s%> za-Rot; strange women וְ֝לִבְּךָ֗ <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-be-cha, and thine heart יְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber shall utter תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <S%H8419><s%> tah-pu-Chot. perverse things

וְ֭הָיִיתָ <S%H1961><s%> Ve-ha-yi-ta become כְּשֹׁכֵ֣ב <S%H7901><s%> ke-sho-Chev Yea thou shalt be as he that lieth down בְּלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> be-lev- in the midst יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> Yam; of the sea וּ֝כְשֹׁכֵ֗ב <S%H7901><s%> u-che-sho-Chev, or as he that lieth בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> be-Rosh upon the top חִבֵּֽל׃ <S%H2260><s%> chib-Bel. of a mast

הִכּ֥וּנִי <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ku-ni They have stricken בַל־ <S%H1077><s%> val- did not חָלִיתִי֮ <S%H2470><s%> cha-li-Ti me [shalt thou say and] I was not sick הֲלָמ֗וּנִי <S%H1986><s%> ha-la-Mu-ni, they have beaten בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- did not יָ֫דָ֥עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-ti me [and] I felt מָתַ֥י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai When אָקִ֑יץ <S%H6974><s%> 'a-Kitz; [it] not when shall I awake א֝וֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> o-Sif, it yet אֲבַקְשֶׁ֥נּוּ <S%H1245><s%> 'a-vak-Shen-nu ;I will seek עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. again
